attributes.action: stop the preposed changes to the Windsor relief road & Eton park and ride.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, the youth of Eton Wick are objecting to the Eton park and ride and the proposed off ramp of the Windsor relief road.
We believe that there is no need to pedestrioanise this area. Eton and Eton Wick area is perfect just the way it is. The Eton Wick infrastructure cannot handle the amount of new traffic this will bring through each day.
The increase of traffic will lead to an increase of heavy freight, rush hour traffic, number of crimes in this area and road traffic accsidents. It will block off the E0ton wick road which predestions use all the time to come from Slough, Eton and Windsor. it will add time to local people's journeys and push people put of there way into Eton wick.
attributes.creator_name: Members of the Eton Wick youth center
